title: Opera: Private Web Browser
description:
Your ultimate, no-BS browser ‚Äì faster, safer, and packed with tools the others wish they had. Free VPN, ad-blocking, tracker-blocking, and total customization, all in one package. Say goodbye to basic and hello to a browser that actually does more than load pages.

THE FULL FEATURE LINEUP:
üõ°Ô∏è Free VPN ‚Äì Because your privacy shouldn‚Äôt come with a price tag.
‚õî Enhanced Ad Blocker ‚Äì Ads? Nope. uBlock Origin-powered, so it actually works.
üëÄ Tracker Blocker ‚Äì Stops others from selling your browsing habits.
üé® Total Customization ‚Äì Dark Mode, wallpapers, themes‚Äîmake it your browser.
üåç Sync Across Devices ‚Äì Keep your tabs, bookmarks, and settings wherever you go.

üö´ BLOCK ADS. TAKE BACK CONTROL.
Tired of the internet looking like Times Square? Our ad blocker does more than slap a bandaid on the problem‚Äîit deletes ads, trackers, and all the other garbage slowing you down.

üõ°Ô∏è BROWSE PRIVATELY, ANYWHERE.
Free VPN = total privacy with just one tap. No sign-ups, no weird data collection, no "7-day free trials" that suddenly charge you $9.99. It just works.

üîí LOCK DOWN EVERY DEVICE.
Need protection beyond Opera? VPN Pro covers everything‚Äîyour apps, your entire phone, even your grandma‚Äôs tablet (if you‚Äôre feeling generous). One subscription, six devices.

üìâ DATA SAVINGS THAT ACTUALLY SAVE DATA.
Why load a 10MB webpage when we can slim it down for you? Opera compresses pages, so you get the speed without the data drain.

üé® YOUR BROWSER, YOUR RULES.
Customize everything‚Äîwallpapers, icons, layouts. Dark Mode? Of course. Opera is your browser, not just another cookie-cutter app.

Got questions? Check out our Help and FAQ: opera.com/help
Terms of Service: legal.opera.com/terms
Privacy Policy: legal.opera.com/privacy

Ditch the average. Opera is what the internet should be. Download now and upgrade your browsing game.
